name: Prana Bridger Jeans 30" Inseam - Men's
description:
When there just isn't room for your active pants and your jeans, pack these. With a slim fit and classic 5-pocket design, they're nondescript during the day. But with cotton, polyester and spandex in the mix, these jeans accommodate movement when climbing or riding a bike around town.Made of organically grown cotton and polyester with the added flex of spandex.2 front slash pockets, 1 drop-in pocket, and 2 back pockets for plenty of places to stow change, receipts, wallets, or whatever else.No-nonsense zippered fly.

        Sustainability
